subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}} # to [[go]]; to [[proceed]] (to a [[place]]) #* {{zh-x|大夫 七十 而 致事。若 不得 謝，則 必 賜 之 几杖，行役 以 婦人。適 四方，乘 安車{jū}。|A great officer, when he is seventy, should resign (his charge of) affairs.
If he be not allowed to resign, there must be given him a stool and staff.
When travelling on service, he must have the attendance of his wife.
When '''going to''' any other state, he will ride in an easy carriage.|ref=Liji}} #* {{zh-x|三 人 行 而 一 人 惑，所 適 者 猶 可 致 也，惑 者 少{shǎo} 也；二 人 惑 則 勞 而 不 至，惑 者 勝 也。|If three men be walking together, and (only) one of them be under a delusion (as to their way), they may yet reach their goal [i.e. place they are '''going to'''], the deluded being the fewer; but if two of them be under the delusion, they will not do so, the deluded being the majority.|ref=Zhuangzi}} # to [[incline]] [[towards]]; {{lb|zh|of the [[popular]] [[feeling]]}} to [[tend]] towards; to [[turn]] towards # [[towards]]; [[to]] # {{lb|zh|of a [[girl]]}} to [[get married]]; to [[marry]] # to [[follow]]; to [[submit]] to; to [[comply]] with # to [[fit]]; to [[suit]]; to [[accord]] with # [[fitting]]; [[proper]]; [[suitable]]; [[appropriate]] # [[good]]; [[fine]]; [[adequate]] # [[happy]]; [[joyful]]; [[contented]] # [[at ease]]; [[comfortable]]; [[cosy]] # to [[get]]; to [[obtain]] # to [[control]]; to [[restrict]]; to [[moderate]] # to [[regulate]]; to [[adjust]]; to [[measure]] # to [[meet]]; to [[encounter]] # {{lb|zh|historical}} [[collar]] of the [[mourning]] [[gown]] # [[by chance]]; as [[luck]] would [[have]] it # [[occasionally]]; [[from time to time]] # [[just]] (now); [[only]] # [[if]]; [[assuming]] # {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|fold=1|刻足適屨|不良適應|刖趾適屨|合適|不適|悠然自適|恬適|刖足適屨|削趾適屨|安適如常|安適|北轅適楚|削足適履|最適化|會逢其適|截趾適屨|社會調適|視覺適應|改適|無所適從|難易適中|適齡|適口|適婚年齡|順適|適間|適值|適得其所|適當|適人|適量|適度|適用|調適|適然|適從|適性|閒適|適意|舒適|適銷對路|適者生存|自適|適宜|適銷|適逢其會|適材適用|適時|適悶|適得其反|適合|適可而止|適來|適任|適中下懷|適中|適切|適才|適應|各適其適}}
